title: Bug 124067: Relative path not supported when selecting XML file
description: When selecting an XML file, the application should support both relative and absolute paths.
OB: The application does not currently support relative paths when selecting an XML file.
EB: When selecting an XML file, the application only supports absolute paths. Relative paths are not recognized or processed.
SR: To address this issue, the application should allow users to use both relative and absolute paths when selecting an XML file. Additionally, a new datasource and dataset should be created based on the XML file.
